name: Bringing Digital Environment (BriDgE)
short_description:
Bringing Digital Environment bridges differences between traditional and digital libraries’ standards, and makes possible the automated creation of a digital resource by means of sewing together of bibliographic records and digital objects.
BRI-DGE takes in input ISO2709 format files, digital images and technical  description of images, gets relevant information and brings together in a metadata framework based on METS, MODS, MIX standards.
